description.summary: The Quad is a group of four dormitories on the west side of campus.
description.details: The Quad consists of Fisher Hassenfeld College House, Riepe College House, Ware College House and New College House West. The Quad offers a variety of room types and amenities for students.

description.summary: Sansom Place is a high-rise apartment complex on the east side of campus.
the chestnut is a high-rise apartment complex on the east side of campus.
Rodin is a high-rise apartment complex on the east side of campus.
